hostName.title: Snaphot URL
hostName.description: http(s) URL of camera to receive snapshot from.

botId.title: ID of Bot
botId.description: ID of telegram bot (without leading bot).

chatId.title: ID of Chat
chatId.description: ID of the Telegram chat to send the picture to (including minus sign).

locale.title: Locale
locale.description: Locale String to format the Date and Time information
